channel.title: 667/704 Issue
channel.description: So i'm using a 667/704 client for my server, and I want to remove the runescape logo on the bottom right of the loading screen. If this is not possible, I want to remove the background all together. I've searched everywhere I could think of, with no success. I would appreciate it if someone could help me out.

item.title: 667/704 Issue
item.dc:creator: @cia_nick cia nick
item.description:
@cia_nick wrote:

[quote=“Deus1993, post:5, topic:438072”]JAR the client, and put the class as Loader.class

Ta da, you have a webclient…[/quote]

can you please help me it wont work…

Read full topic

item.title: 667/704 Issue
item.dc:creator: @The_Moparian The Moparian
item.description:
@The_Moparian wrote:

[quote=“ipwnu2day, post:7, topic:438072”][quote author=The Moparian link=topic=540792.msg3960648#msg3960648 date=1333246569]
So i’m using a 667/704 client for my server, and I want to remove the runescape logo on the bottom right of the loading screen. If this is not possible, I want to remove the background all together. I’ve searched everywhere I could think of, with no success. I would appreciate it if someone could help me out.
[/quote]

Actually it depends on what you are talking about. Are you talking about the background of RuneScape at start up screen or like text in the right corner that says RuneScape. If it is the first one then I don’t know. All I know is that you have to find some kind of cache editor program. If it is the second on then simply go to your client and open up client.java and look for “RuneScape” and edit it to whatever your RuneScape Private Server name is.[/quote]

Thanks for the post. However, this is not a simply text change. I’m assuming this logo is packed in the cache. So I’m attempting to figure out how to eaiter remove the code that points to that logo, or delete the logo all together. I wish it was as easy as it sounds…

Read full topic

item.title: 667/704 Issue
item.dc:creator: @ipwnu2day ipwnu2day
item.description:
@ipwnu2day wrote:

The Moparian:

So i’m using a 667/704 client for my server, and I want to remove the runescape logo on the bottom right of the loading screen. If this is not possible, I want to remove the background all together. I’ve searched everywhere I could think of, with no success. I would appreciate it if someone could help me out.

Actually it depends on what you are talking about. Are you talking about the background of RuneScape at start up screen or like text in the right corner that says RuneScape. If it is the first one then I don’t know. All I know is that you have to find some kind of cache editor program. If it is the second on then simply go to your client and open up client.java and look for “RuneScape” and edit it to whatever your RuneScape Private Server name is.

Read full topic
